TopicTitle: On my IPad. In my Bed. 4:42. AM.

Articles.Content:
Doing this so that tomorrow I can go to bed early so that I can wake up earlier.

Should I go to sleep or wait till the morning comes?
Sleep a bit. Sorry, you've probably decided by now.
I was about to respond when I noticed this thread was 2 days old... Moderator should lock it then, as it doesn't really serve a purpose anymore.

Really, a public forum is probably not the best place to ask a question like this.

And for the record, if you see a thread that you think needs locking, it's advised that you bring it to our attention through the "Report Post" function.
